#include <math.h>
#include <stdio.h>
#define MOD  1000000007
void M(unsigned long long  a[][2],unsigned long long  b[][2])
{
	unsigned long long x = a[0][0]*b[0][0] + a[0][1]*b[1][0];
	unsigned long long y = a[0][0]*b[0][1] + a[0][1]*b[1][1];
	unsigned long long z = a[1][0]*b[0][0] + a[1][1]*b[1][0];
	unsigned long long w = a[1][0]*b[0][1] + a[1][1]*b[1][1];
	a[0][0]=x%MOD;
	a[0][1]=y%MOD;
	a[1][0]=z%MOD;
	a[1][1]=w%MOD;
}
void  POWER(unsigned long long  c[][2],unsigned long long n)
{
	if(n==1||n==0)return ;
	unsigned long long  F[2][2];
	F[0][0]=1;
	F[0][1]=1;
	F[1][0]=1;
	F[1][1]=0;
	POWER(c,n/2);
	M(c,c);
	if(n%2==1)
		M(c,F);
}
main()
{
	int test ;
	unsigned long long  c[2][2];
	scanf("%d",&test);
	while(test--)
		{
			c[0][0]=1;
			c[0][1]=1;
			c[1][0]=1;
			c[1][1]=0;
			unsigned long long n;
			scanf("%llu",&n);
			if(n==0)
			printf("%d\n",0);
			else{
			 POWER(c,n-1);
			printf("%llu\n",c[0][0]);}
		}
}
